body_html: I think that should work, but I don't mind either way. One caveat, the command-line args to grpc_tensorflow_server.cc weren't designed for ease-of-use... just for testing. In particular, there's no simple flag for "just run it locally and print out what port you chose" or "just run it locally on a particular port" options. It might be desirable to add those :).

body: I think that should work, but I don't mind either way. One caveat, the command-line args to grpc_tensorflow_server.cc weren't designed for ease-of-use... just for testing. In particular, there's no simple flag for "just run it locally and print out what port you chose" or "just run it locally on a particular port" options. It might be desirable to add those :).
